replies.body: Any news about championship riven?{{champion:92}}

Riot, what is the point of having three levels of rune tiers on sale when in battle against an opponent with tier 1 runes he/she destroys a summoner with lvl 3 runes early game. Three times I have been in this predicament and in some cases my opponent has had no runes, and by the way its been in ranked and unranked games while playing mid.This seems to be an unfair advantage to those of us who spend alot of time and money on this game.As for ranked. Why dont those of us who have been playing this game for years be placed in seperate rank levels to those who have only recently joined.Cheers.

Talking about {{champion:268}} , have u guys ever thought about his soldiers being kill able? maybe giving his soldiers a 1 hit health bar and it can scale through out the game, also maybe increase his soldiers like 1 or two so maybe that is easier to balance and think about it, an emperor only have 3 soldiers?! (they not even generals)

and in the future when tech is supported, soldiers can attack multiple target? he is so fun, although im not an experienced player and main him, but is sad to see the nerfs and even voices of rework which considering that his still quite a new champion!

azir's soldiers can attack multiple enemies providing they are behind/in front of the targeted enemy. if you mean they can attack multiple people in different locations in their attack range that would just be op.
